mensHaircut.name: Men's Haircut
mensHaircut.description: Individual men's haircut tailored to face shape, hair texture, and personal style. Includes clean styling. Focused service – precise, professional, no add-ons.

mensHaircutPro.description: In-depth consultation. Hair wash, scalp massage, conditioner. Individual haircut and styling. Drink included. More time, more calm, more experience.

beardTrim.description: Professional beard shaping and precise contours. Traditional wet shave (for Classic Shave). Aftershave and finishing care.
